Thanks for attempting to answer question 1, howerver my initial question was to find out where a launcher is getting its icon from, if it is currently using the icon.  This could apply to any number of current launcher already present.
if its specific to that app it will be in ~/.wine but if its using an ubuntu icon it'll be in /usr/share/pixmaps
Thanks.  Is the /usr/share/icon folder reserved for system icons?
its where some icons are, you can copy any others you want there with sudo cp
